title: Turban
description: two seamed pieces of black and white plaid; embroidered overall in green, yellow, purples and lavender hexagons and diamonds; 8\" x 4\" sections near center seam is not embroidered; both ends overcase in pinks, green, yellow
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
